forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms Likely then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 8pm, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and 9pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 65. Northwest wind 1 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
